Text: Got a letter from Comcast after downloading a previous Cape episode...buddy thinks its due to the recent Comcast purchase of NBC
Is this show getting better or worse?

This is a really poor show.

Crap hero with no super powers.  Crap outfit, crap special effects, crap script, boring-as-hell plot with pointless filler characters.  I yearn for a decent hero series but this a lame duck.

Shame, as I like some of the cast.

It's getting worse.
